property.name: Text
property.value: As an additional cost to play Hallow, return a total of 10 [Bless] tokens to the token pool from the chaos bag or sealed on cards in play. Remove 1 doom from any card in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: η: Fight. You get +2 ή and deal +1 damage for this attack. When you initiate this ability, you may release a [Bless] token sealed on Holy Spear. η Search the chaos bag for 2 [Bless] tokens and seal them on Holy Spear: Fight. You get +4 ή and deal +2 damage for this attack.

property.name: Text
property.value: Permanent. Exceptional. Your deck must include at least 10 skills. Your deck size is increased by 5. ι Before you draw your opening hand: Attack 5 random non-weakness skills from your deck facedown to this card. θ Exhaust Ancestral Knowledge: Draw 1 attached skill.

property.name: Text
property.value: Uses (0 secrets). Secrets on Ariadne's Twine can be spent as if they were on any asset controlled by an investigator at your location. θ Exhaust Ariadne's Twine: Move 1 secret from an asset you control to your resource pool, as a resource, or vice versa.

property.name: Text
property.value: Fast. Uses (4 ammo). η Spend 1 ammo: Fight. If the attacked enemy is exhausted, you get +2 ή and deal +1 damage for this attack. ι After you evade an enemy at your location: Perform the above Fight ability without spending an action.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may commit Justify the Means to any type of test. As an additional cost to commit Justify the Means to a skill test, add [Curse] tokens to the chaos bag equal to this test's difficulty. This test automatically succeeds.

property.name: Text
property.value: Exceptional. ι When you reveal a non-[Curse], non-[Autofail] chaos token, add 1 [Curse] token to the chaos bag: Ignore the just revealed token and reveal another one to resolve. If that token as a [Curse] or [Autofail] symbol, return Lucky Dice to your hand (cannot be ignored/canceled).

property.name: Text
property.value: Either (choose one): — Add X [Curse] tokens to the chaos bag to add X [Bless] tokens to the chaos bag. — Remove X [Curse] and X [Bless] tokens from the chaos bag to heal X total horror from among cards at your location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Jacob Morrison does not ready during the upkeep phase. ι When you would fail a skill test, exhaust Jacob Morrison: You get +2 skill value for that test. ι After a [Bless] token is revealed from the chaos bag during a skill test you are performing: Ready Jacob Morrison.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to your location. Uses (3 offerings). Attached location gains: "θ Draw the top card of the encounter deck, exhaust Shrine of the Moirai, and spend 1 offering: Return up to 2 cards with a total combined level of 5 or less from your discard pile to your hand." Card design by the Moirai at Arkham Nights 2019.

property.name: Text
property.value: α: –1 (–3 instead if there are 4 or more unflooded Y'ha-nthlei locations in play). β: –3. If you fail, place 1 doom on the current agenda (this may cause the current agenda to advance). γ: –4. If you fail, you must either increase the flood level of your location or take 1 damage. δ: –5. If you fail and there is a key on your location, take 1 horror.

property.name: Text
property.value: α: –2 (–4 instead if there are 4 or more unflooded Y'ha-nthlei locations in play). β: –4. If you fail, place 1 doom on the current agenda (this may cause the current agenda to advance). γ: –5. If you fail, you must either increase the flood level of your location or take 1 damage. δ: –6. If you fail and there is a key on your location, take 1 horror.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced – When your turn begins, if you are at a fully flooded location, you struggle for air: When your turn ends, if you did not enter an unflooded or partially flooded location during your turn, take 5 damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shuffle the set-aside Lloigor enemy and the set-aside Aquatic Abomination enemy into the encounter deck, along with the encounter discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced – When your turn begins, if you are at a fully flooded location, you struggle for air: When your turn ends, if you did not enter an unflooded or partially flooded location during your turn, take 5 damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: If Hydra is in play, flip her to her (Awakened and Enraged) side. If Dagon is in play and slumbering, flip him to his (Awakened and Enraged) side.

property.name: Text
property.value: If an Ancient one enemy is slumbering, flip it to its (Awakened and Enraged) side. Forced – When your turn begins, if you are at a fully flooded location, you struggle for air: When your turn ends, if you did not enter an unflooded or partially flooded location during your turn, take 5 damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Objective – If each investigator is at Gateway to Y'ha-nthlei and the investigators possess each of the following keys (blue, red, yellow, and green), advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: Remove each location other than Gateway to Y'ha-nthlei from the game (or add them to the victory display if they have Victory X and no clues remaining). Discard each card at those locations. Put set-aside locations into play as shown in the Campaign Guide, following the "Act 2 Setup" instructions. (Note that the number of Y'ha-nthlei locations used and the arrangement of the locations varies depening on the number of investigators in the game.) Put the set-aside Hydra enemy into play in the Lair of Hydra, (Deep in Slumber) side faceup. pur the set-aside Dagon enemy into play in the Lair of Daton. Check the Campaign Log. If Dagon has awakened, he enters play (Awakened and Enraged) side faceup. If Dagon still slumbers, he enters play (Deep in Slumber) side faceup.

property.name: Text
property.value: θ Either remove 1π damage from an Ancient One enemy at your location, or investigator at a Lair location spend 1π clues, as a group: Decrease the flood level of any non-Sanctum location in play. Objective – Stop the Deep Ones' ritual by draining the city. If each location in play is unflooded, advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: Add this card to the victory display. — If there is another act card in play, you may choose to either continue playing in order to accomplish the objective on that act card, or proceed immediately to (-> R1) without fulfilling that objective. — If there are no other act cards in play, proceed to (-> R1). Victory 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: Objective – Recover the riches of the Deep Ones. If the Lair of Hydra, and the Vault of Riches with the purple key have no clues on them, advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: Add this card to the victory display. — If there is another act card in play, you may choose to either continue playing in order to accomplish the objective on that act card, or proceed immediately to (-> R1) without fulfilling that objective. — If there are no other act cards in play, proceed to (-> R1). Victory 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: Objective – Collapse the vault containing the Deep Ones' riches. If Dagon and Hydra each have at least 4π damage on them, advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: Add this card to the victory display. — If there is another act card in play, you may choose to either continue playing in order to accomplish the objective on that act card, or proceed immediately to (-> R1) without fulfilling that objective. — If there are no other act cards in play, proceed to (-> R1). Victory 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced – After Dark Abyss is revealed: Randomly choose 1 of the set-aside facedown keys and place it on Dark Abyss without looking at it. Forced – After the last clue is discovered from Dark Abyss: Dark Abyss becomes fully flooded. Increase flood level of each location connected Dark Abyss.

property.name: Text
property.value: Gateway to Y'ha-nthlei enters play partially flooded (even while it is unrevealed).

property.name: Text
property.value: Y'ha-nthlei enters play partially flooded (even while it is unrevealed).

property.name: Text
property.value: η If you control the black key: Place it on Sunken Halls. Forced – After an enemy enters Sunken Halls, if the black key is on Sunken Halls: Deal 2 damage to that enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: Y'ha-nthlei enters play partially flooded (even while it is unrevealed).

property.name: Text
property.value: η If you control the purple key: Place it on Vault of Riches. Then, choose a non-Elite enemy at anylocation. Automatically evade that enemy and move it to Vault of Riches. That enemy does not ready during the next upkeep phase. (Group limit once per game.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Y'ha-nthlei enters play partially flooded (even while it is unrevealed).

property.name: Text
property.value: η If you control the white key: Place it on Undersea Corridors. θ If the white key is on Undersea Corridors: Move. Move to a connecting location. (Limit once per round.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Y'ha-nthlei Sanctum enters play fullyflooded (even while it is unrevealed).

property.name: Text
property.value: η If you control the blue key, place it on this location and investigators here spend 1π, as a group: Automatically evade each Ancient One enemy. Unflood this location. For the remainder of the game, this location cannot be flooded. (Group limit once per game.) Forced – After you fail a skill test while investigating this location: Take 1 damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Y'ha-nthlei Sanctum enters play fully flooded (even while it is unrevealed).

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Depp One enemy at this location gets +2 flight. η If you control the green key, place it on this location and investigators here spend 1π clues, as a group: Automatically evade each Ancient One enemy. Unflood this location. For the remainder of the game, this location cannot be flooded. (Group limit once per game.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Y'ha-nthlei Sanctum enters play fully flooded (even while it is unrevealed).

property.name: Text
property.value: η If you control the red key, place it on this location and investigators here spend 1π clues, as a group: Automatically evade each Ancient One enemy. Unflood this location. For the remainder of the game, this location cannot be flooded. (Group limit once per game.) Forced – After any location's flood value is increased: Each investigator at this location takes 1 horror.

property.name: Text
property.value: Y'ha-nthlei Sanctum enters play fully flooded (even while it is unrevealed).

property.name: Text
property.value: During the enemy phase, each ready Ancient One enemy can attack investigators here as if they were engaged. η If you control the yellow key, place it on this location and investigators here spend 1π clues, as a group: Automatically evade each Ancient One enemy. Unflood this location. For the remainder of the game, this location cannot be flooded. (Group limit once per game.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Lair of Dagon gets –1 shroud for each Sanctum location with a key on it. θ Check Campaign Log. If all 7 keys are on locations and the Order's ritual was disrupted: You dig deep into your memories to recall what happened the last time you were here. Read Flash back XIV in the Campaign Guide.

property.name: Text
property.value: Lair of Hydra gets –1 shroud for each Sanctum location with a key on it. η Place the black, purple, or white key on this location: Deal 3 damage to an Ancient One enemy that is not slumbering. (Group limit once per game.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Dagon is slumbering. He cannot attack or engage, and is immune to investigator actions and play card effects. Forced – At the end of the round, if an investigator is in Lair of Dagon and Dagon is ready: Place 1 doom on him. η: Test ά (4). If you succeed, either exhaust Dagon or remove 1 doom from him. If you fail by 3 or more, place 1 doom on him.

property.name: Text
property.value: Hunter. Massive. Retaliate. Dagon gets –1 fight for each Sanctum location with a key on it. Forced – After Dagon is evaded or dealt damage: Do the same to a copy of Dagon's Brood in play, as well.

property.name: Text
property.value: Hydra is slumbering. She cannot attack or engage, and is immune to investigator actions and play card effects. Forced – At the end of the round, if an investigator is in Lair of Hydra and Hydra is ready: Place 1 doom on her. η: Test ά (4). If you succeed, either exhaust Hydra or remove 1 doom from her. If you fail by 3 or more, place 1 doom on her.

property.name: Text
property.value: Hunter. Massive. Retaliate. Dagon gets –1 fight for each Sanctum location with a key on it. Forced – After Hydra is evaded or dealt damage: Do the same to a copy of Hydra's Brood in play, as well.

property.name: Text
property.value: Hunter. While Aquatic Abomination is moving, fully flooded locations are considered to be connected to one another. Aquatic Abomination cannot attack during the same phase it moved via its hunter keyword.

property.name: Text
property.value: Spawn – Lair of Dagon or Gateway to Y'ha-nthlei (whichever is farthest from you). Hunter. Forced – After Dagon's Brood engages you, if Dagon is in play: Either place 1 doom on Dagon, or Dagon attacks you.

property.name: Text
property.value: Spawn – Lair of Hydra or Gateway to Y'ha-nthlei (whichever is farthest from you). Hunter. Forced – After Dagon's Brood engages you, if Hydra is in play: Either place 1 doom on Hydra, or Hydra attacks you.

property.name: Text
property.value: Peril. Revelation – You must either (choose one): — Increase the flood level of your current location. — Discard assets from your play area with a total resource cost of at least X, where X is your location's shroud value.

property.name: Text
property.value: Peril. Revelation – Test ά (2). This test gets +1 difficulty for each Sanctum location with a key on it. If you fail, you must either place 1 doom on the current agenda (this effect may cause the current agenda to advance), or the nearest Ancient One enemy in play attacks you.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveleation – If no investigators are at flooded locations, Thalassophobia gains surge. Otherwise, each investigator at a partially flooded location takes 1 horror, and each investigator at a fully flooded location takes 1 direct horror that cannot be prevented.

property.name: Text
property.value: You ignore the Forced ability on the current agenda. Forced – When any amount of damage would be placed on you: Place 1 of that damage on Diving Suit. Forced – When Diving Suit leaves play: Remove it from the game.
